document_data.mainbody:
Beltrar Morgrin was a War Wizard of Cormyr in the late 14 century DR, and a traitor to the Realm.
When the retinue of the Royal Magician of Cormyr, Caladnei raided the Marsember meeting of the Rightful Conspiracy in early spring of , Caladnei observed that Beltrar Morgrin was among the traitors and had hid downcellar. She directed Thoaburr to him. Though Beltrar was to be taken quietly, he was not to see morning alive.
